protocol.name: P-GSE18311-2
protocol.text: Leaf primordia were transferred to liquid nitrogen before RNA extraction

protocol.name: P-GSE18311-3
protocol.text: Plants were grown at 22C under continuous light.

protocol.name: P-GSE18311-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was prepared using RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE18311-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 microg total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE18311-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method.
